page.title: 13Fathers' Occupations.
page.content: We compared the school records of fathers' occupations now with those of {50}years ago. We ignored the fact that families have grown smaller in recent years and that many fathers were obviously counted more than once. Our results of {50}years ago gave us a total of {172}coal miners.At present there is only {1}father who works down a mine , an indication of the large scale closure of pits that has taken place over the years. The other main jobs of {50}years ago were steelworkers, railwaymen and labourers. Today, the occupations of fathers are very varied, with no predominance of any specific job, apart from possibly working in the Port Talbot Steel Works. A.T./D.M.
